text: I’m hosting our fourth COVID-19 Tele-Town Hall, this Wednesday at 3:10pm. Last week, almost 7,000 constituents joined our call, and I look forward to another informative session on Wednesday. Stay tuned for an announcement on our special guests! https://t.co/KjTFKDS2Ww

Thank you to my colleagues @RepLeeZeldin, @RepGregMurphy, and @DanCrenshawTX for their support on this legislation to eliminate barriers to Veteran's access to a lifesaving therapy.

Stellate ganglion block (SGB) is proven to alleviate common PTSD symptoms, including hyperarousal and anxiety, by injecting an anesthetic agent onto a collection of nerves in the neck responsible for the activation of the "fight or flight" response.
Each year, 11-20% of Operations Iraqi and Enduring Freedom, 12% of Gulf War, and 15% of Vietnam Veterans are diagnosed with PTSD. Yet, only 40% are finding relief with current treatments.

We have a moral duty to care for our Veterans who risked everything for our Country. Today, I introduced the TREAT PTSD Act to provide our Veterans suffering from PTSD with unrestricted access to a promising treatment – stellate ganglion block (SGB). https://t.co/JSg3BIRJuC
